description: Practice the past perfect continuous tense with fill-in-the-blank questions.

questions.question: I ____ (work) there for two years when I got promoted.
She ____ (study) for three hours before the exam started.
They ____ (live) in London for five years before moving to Paris.
We ____ (wait) for an hour when the train finally arrived.
He ____ (play) tennis since morning when it started raining.
You ____ (learn) Spanish for months before you went to Spain.

title: Past Perfect Continuous
